channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s rush for Ukraine peace deal may leave details up to Putin
item.description: The U.S. president declared Saturday that he would forego his previous demand for an initial ceasefire, making it easier for Putin to continue the war...

item.title: Putin made maximalist claims to Ukrainian territory in Trump summit: Sources
item.description: The peace terms that Russian President Vladimir Putin laid out in his summit with President Trump included that Ukraine withdraw entirely from two of ...

item.title: "Next time in Moscow": Putin extends Trump invitation as summit ends
item.description: At the conclusion of Friday's "productive" but inconclusive summit on Friday, Russian President Vladimir Putin quipped to President Trump: "Next time ...

item.title: Trump-Putin summit starts on red carpet, ends in confusion
item.description: Friday's summit in Alaska began as a superpower spectacle, then abruptly ended without any indication of what was achieved or where things go from her...

item.title: Job market gloom hasn't been this bad since the Great Recession
item.description: Data: University of Michigan; Chart: Axios Visuals Americans haven't been this gloomy about the job market since the Great Recession. Why it matters :...

item.title: Trump to meet Zelensky on Monday after "difficult" post-summit call
item.description: After his summit with Russian President Putin in Alaska on Friday, President Trump will meet Ukrainian President Zelensky for what could be a difficul...

item.title: We drove Trump’s D.C. Turns out, he may not be seeing much.
item.description: Washington Post reporters retraced some of the president’s motorcade routes through the nation’s capital. Here’s what we saw.

item.title: Trump drops ceasefire demand for Ukraine war, tells allies Putin wants land
item.description: Trump’s swerve increases pressure on the Ukrainian leader as he heads to the White House on Monday to make his case.

item.title: Key takeaways from Trump-Putin summit and dramatic ceasefire reversal
item.description: President Trump dropped his demand for an immediate ceasefire in Ukraine after meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Here are five takeaways ...

item.title: Dallas ended downtown homelessness. White House wants to change the rules.
item.description: The new push focuses on temporary, emergency shelters rather than lasting supports and would cut people off services after two years.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
